title: 53: Finding a Contractor You Can Trust
description: Spring is here which means wacky weather for Texas. With an unexpected tornado last December and several hail storms since the start of 2016, the contractors are rolling in.
itunes:subtitle: Spring is here which means wacky weather for Texas. With an unexpected tornado last December and several hail storms since the start of 2016, the contractors are rolling in.
itunes:summary: Spring is here which means wacky weather for Texas. With an unexpected tornado last December and several hail storms since the start of 2016, the contractors are rolling in.  But who do you trust? Laura and Larry discuss some signs to look out for should you find yourself seeking repairs for weather related damage.
itunes:author: hpd architecture + interiors
